elements.name: User calls the API with valid details to get satellite location "Unit miles"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25544"
the user will call the "/satellites/id/positions" with "1636029892568,1636029892568", "miles" and "4"
the status code is 200
receive a valid response

elements.name: User calls the API with valid details to get satellite location "Unit kilometers"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25544"
the user will call the "/satellites/id/positions" with "1636029892568,1636029892568,1736029892568", "kilometers" and "4"
the status code is 200
receive a valid response

elements.name: User calls the API with valid details to get satellite location "without unit"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25544"
the user will call the "/satellites/id/positions" with "1636029892568,1636029892568,1736029892568", "" and "4"
the status code is 200
receive a valid response

elements.name: User calls the API with valid details to get satellite location "without unit and indent 100"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25544"
the user will call the "/satellites/id/positions" with "1636029892568,1636029892568,1736029892568", "" and "100"
the status code is 200
receive a valid response

elements.name: User calls the API with valid details to get satellite location "without unit and indent"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25544"
the user will call the "/satellites/id/positions" with "1636029892568,1636029892568,1736029892568", "" and ""
the status code is 200
receive a valid response

elements.name: User calls the API with valid details to get satellite location "unit with different value other than Miles and kilometers"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25544"
the user will call the "/satellites/id/positions" with "1636029892568", "yards" and ""
the status code is 200
receive a valid response

elements.name: User calls the API with invalid details to get satellite location "Unknown satellite no"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25644"
the user will call the "/satellites/id/positions" with "1636029892568,1636029892568", "miles" and "4"
should return status code as "404"
user should receive an error message as like "satellite not found"

elements.name: User calls the API with invalid details to get satellite location "Invalid timestamp"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25544"
the user will call the "/satellites/id/positions" with "saturday29122020,1636029892568", "miles" and "4"
should return status code as "400"
user should receive an error message as like "invalid timestamp in list: saturday29122020"

elements.name: User calls the API with invalid details to get satellite location "Alphanumeric Satellite id"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25A44"
the user will call the "/satellites/id/positions" with "1636029892568,1636029892568", "miles" and "4"
should return status code as "404"
user should receive an error message as like "satellite not found"

elements.name: User calls the API with invalid details to get satellite location "With special char"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25%^%^&%&^44"
the user will call the "/satellites/id/positions" with "1636029892568,1636029892568", "miles" and "4"
should return status code as "404"
user should receive an error message as like "satellite not found"

elements.name: User calls the API with invalid details to get satellite location "different set of special char"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "2@!£@$%^&*"
the user will call the "/satellites/id/positions" with "1636029892568,1636029892568", "miles" and "4"
should return status code as "404"
user should receive an error message as like "satellite not found"

elements.name: User calls the API with invalid details to get satellite location "without timestamp"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25544"
the user will call the "/satellites/id/positions" with "", "miles" and "4"
should return status code as "400"
user should receive an error message as like "invalid timestamp in list:"

elements.name: User calls the API with invalid details to get satellite location "Alphanumeric satellite id and no timestamp"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25544"
the user will call the "/satellites/id/positions" with "", "miles" and "4"
should return status code as "400"
user should receive an error message as like "invalid timestamp in list:"

name: This feature is to identify location of ISS using api services

elements.name: User calls the API with valid details to get satellite TLE data "Response in text format for a valid satellite id"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25544"
the user will call the TLE "/satellites/id/tles" with "text"
should receive the status code is 200
should receive a valid data for the satellite "ISS (ZARYA)"

elements.name: User calls the API with valid details to get satellite TLE data "Response in Json format for a valid satellite id"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25544"
the user will call the TLE "/satellites/id/tles" with "json"
should receive the status code is 200
should receive a valid data for the satellite "ISS (ZARYA)"

elements.name: User calls the API with valid details to get satellite TLE data "without format"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25544"
the user will call the TLE "/satellites/id/tles" with ""
should receive the status code is 200
should receive a valid data for the satellite "ISS (ZARYA)"

elements.name: User calls the API with valid details to get satellite TLE data "special charater in format field"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25544"
the user will call the TLE "/satellites/id/tles" with "*%@!{_=+"
should receive the status code is 200
should receive a valid data for the satellite "ISS (ZARYA)"

elements.name: User calls the API with invalid details to get satellite TLE data "invalid ulr"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25544"
the user will call the TLE "/satellites/id/tle" with "<format>"
should return status code as "404"
user should receive an error message as like "Invalid controller specified (satellites_tle)"

elements.name: User calls the API with invalid details to get satellite TLE data "invalid id"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "25547"
the user will call the TLE "/satellites/id/tles" with "<format>"
should return status code as "404"
user should receive an error message as like "satellite not found"

elements.name: User calls the API with invalid details to get satellite TLE data "alphanumeric and invalid"

steps.name: User is having a satellite NORMAD id as "255SSAS47"
the user will call the TLE "/satellites/id/tles" with "<format>"
should return status code as "404"
user should receive an error message as like "satellite not found"

name: This feature is to gather TLE data of ISS satellite using api services
